rescuecore2.config

Interface ValueConstraint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigConstraint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValueConstraint, ClassNameSetValueConstraint, ClassNameValueConstraint, DiscreteValueConstraint, FloatValueConstraint, IntegerValueConstraint

    public interface ValueConstraint
extends ConfigConstraint
    Interface for specifying constraints on a config value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getKey()
      Get the key this restraint refers to.
      boolean isValid(java.lang.String value, Config config)
      Check if a value is valid.
      boolean undefinedIsValid()
      Find out if an undefined value is counted as valid or invalid.

      • Methods inherited from interface rescuecore2.config.ConfigConstraint

        getDescription, getKeys, isViolated

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        java.lang.String getKey()
        Get the key this restraint refers to.
        Returns:
        The config key.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(java.lang.String value,
              Config config)
        Check if a value is valid.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to check.
        config - The Config object.
        Returns:
        True iff the value is valid.

      • undefinedIsValid

        boolean undefinedIsValid()
        Find out if an undefined value is counted as valid or invalid.
        Returns:
        True if an undefined value should be treated as valid, false if invalid.
